mapper.insert: insert into tb_u3d_web_exp_record(experiment_id, user_id, park_360_browsing, park_top_browsing, park_first_person_browsing, park_auto_browsing, storage_360_browsing, storage_top_browsing, device_awareness, order_processing, replenishment, pick_by_order, pick_by_batch_order, pick_by_disperse, shipping_sweep_code, shipping_intimidate, shipping_sealing, sorting_operation, mode_comparison, ata_comparison, experimental_correct, experimental_report, experimental_evaluation, total_score, time, create_time, update_time) values (#{experimentId},#{userId},#{park360Browsing},#{parkTopBrowsing},#{parkFirstPersonBrowsing},#{parkAutoBrowsing}, #{storage360Browsing},#{storageTopBrowsing},#{deviceAwareness},#{orderProcessing},#{replenishment},#{pickByOrder}, #{pickByBatchOrder},#{pickByDisperse},#{shippingSweepCode},#{shippingIntimidate},#{shippingSealing},#{sortingOperation}, #{modeComparison},#{ataComparison},#{experimentalCorrect},#{experimentalReport},#{experimentalEvaluation},#{totalScore},#{time},now(),now())
mapper.select: select id, experiment_id, user_id, park_360_browsing as park360Browsing, park_top_browsing, park_first_person_browsing, park_auto_browsing, storage_360_browsing as storage360Browsing, storage_top_browsing, device_awareness, order_processing, replenishment as replenishment, pick_by_order, pick_by_batch_order, pick_by_disperse, shipping_sweep_code, shipping_intimidate, shipping_sealing, sorting_operation, mode_comparison, ata_comparison, experimental_correct, experimental_report, experimental_evaluation, total_score, time, create_time, update_time from tb_u3d_web_exp_record where experiment_id=#{experimentId}
